name: gatsby-node-manifest-test-site
description: A test site for Gatsby's node manifest API

scripts.test: cross-env GATSBY_COMMAND_NAME=build jest --runInBand && cross-env GATSBY_COMMAND_NAME=develop jest --runInBand

author: Tyler Barnes <tyler@gatsbyjs.com>
